DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ECONOMY
DOC.TEXT: Industrial Production Rises to 5-Year High : Output at the nation ' s factories , mines and utilities rose 4.2 % last year , as measured by the Federal_Reserve ' s industrial production index.That was the strongest increase since 1988 and followed a 2.3 % rise in 1992 and a drop of 1.8 % in 1991 , a recession year . Production increased during each of the final seven months of the year , rising 0.7 % in December and 0.9 % in November , which was the largest gain in a year . In December , production at factories rose 0.7 % ; at mines and oil fields , 0.5 % ; and at utilities , 1 % .
